manipulations.insert_object: Add a large, realistic birthday cake with candles on the table beside the man, casting a soft glow.
manipulations.remove_object: Remove the dog entirely from the image, seamlessly filling in the space where it was licking the man's face.
manipulations.replace_background: Replace the background with a bustling city street scene, matching the lighting and depth of field.
manipulations.weather_time_change: Add heavy rain to the image, creating visible streaks on the man's glasses and adding puddles on the couch.
manipulations.physics_event: Make the man's glasses suddenly shatter into many pieces, scattering small glass shards around his face with realistic physics.
